channel.title: @Project C-11 release (2)! Amazing Combat Features, Origional source!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/7592/pc11.png[/img]
Download source: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/C-11%20source%20%282%29.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/C-11%20source%20%282%29.zip[/url]
Download client:[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/C-11%20ClientReFact.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/C-11%20ClientReFact.zip[/url]
[B]This is release (2) What has been fixed from (1) ---> (2)? -Login All HeadIcons appear for no reason. -Mage Timers Are Now Correct, Have Fun Bridding? :P -Combat Formula Tweeked (Non-Specs) -Specials Have Been Correct You Can Actually Kill Someone With A Spec Now -Teleports Added With Renaming. (E.g Rock Crabs) -Abit More, Can't Really Remember, You'll See As You Test It. [/B]
[B][I][U]Blog[/U][/I][/B][/CENTER]
[B] Configs saved on log in/out[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]All save on log out[/COLOR][/INDENT]
[B] Public chat[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]All done[/COLOR][/INDENT]

[B] Trading[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Offer[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Remove offer[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Offer X[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Accepting actual trade[/COLOR][/INDENT]

[B] Movement[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Walking Movement[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Running Movement[/COLOR][/INDENT]
[B] Teleports[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Normal spell book[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Ancients[/COLOR] -[COLOR="GREEN"]Custom Teleports[/COLOR][/INDENT]
[B] Shops[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]General shop interface[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Buy[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Sell[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Yellow"]Buy X[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Red"]Sell X[/COLOR][/INDENT]
[B]Potions[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Drinking E.g (4) -> (3)[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Stat Increase[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]When eaten no movement in inventory[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]When inventory full, pot does no disappear[/COLOR][/INDENT]
[B] PvP[/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Range[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Melee[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Magic[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Correct gfx for all[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Correct anim for all[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Freeze timers[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Delay between spells[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Combat formula up to standard[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Special attacks[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Item switching INSTANT[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Item stays in spot in inventory when switch to another[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Red"]Autocast[/COLOR][/INDENT] [B][I][U] Skills[/U][/I][/B] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Herblore [70%][/COLOR] -[COLOR="Yellow"]Woodcutting[/COLOR] -[COLOR="#ffff00"]Fire making[/COLOR] - [COLOR="Yellow"]Mining base[/COLOR][/INDENT]
[I][U]Minigames[/U][/I] [INDENT] -[COLOR="Green"]Barrows (95% Not going any further)[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Duel Arena (not mine)[/COLOR] -[COLOR="Green"]Fight Pits[/COLOR][/INDENT]

I AM LIMBO!

item.title: @Project C-11 release (2)! Amazing Combat Features, Origional source!
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:9, topic:374258”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=470241.msg3438716#msg3438716 date=1292961079]

^Yes, but this isn’t Project Insanity
[/quote]You don’t know that.

Until the OP tells us, or someone takes time to download this just to look at source code, then we cannot really guess.

I say it’s Hyperion considering the look of the character, the start location and the lack of anything else but pking (not a bad thing).

It means someone has taken the time to look at Hyperion and do something with it (if it is Hyperion).

Edit: Which then brings the question: Hyperion already had item support and public chat support?[/quote]

The base is actually Emulous, but my friend blanked it so I could learn the method of creating a stable combat, and thats pretty much all I worked on, is combat and minigames + PVN. And over all I believe I did a good job with this, maybe in 1-2 years I’ll start this again, or if someone decides to do something with it and release, I’ll give them a hand.

Theres only 2 MAJOR problems with this

  1. Npc specing, crashes server, easy fix.
  2. Prayer a little OP so if anyone has a good formula fix level 31 and level 34 attack and str prayers, I OP them by mistake, never told you guys. I was testing something.

Read full topic

Until the OP tells us, or someone takes time to download this just to look at source code, then we cannot really guess.[/quote]
I say it’s Hyperion considering the look of the character, the start location and the lack of anything else but pking (not a bad thing).

@Kaex wrote:

[CENTER]

Download source: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/C-11%20source%20%282%29.zip

Download client:http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/C-11%20ClientReFact.zip

This is release (2)
What has been fixed from (1) —> (2)?
-Login All HeadIcons appear for no reason.
-Mage Timers Are Now Correct, Have Fun Bridding?
-Combat Formula Tweeked (Non-Specs)
-Specials Have Been Correct You Can Actually Kill Someone With A Spec Now
-Teleports Added With Renaming. (E.g Rock Crabs)
-Abit More, Can’t Really Remember, You’ll See As You Test It.
